pages.text: ke’ā‘irabochi wede ḫwala lek’eruti belachewi፡- «yebiritu ch’ikanē balebēti wede ẖonu ḥizibochi (wigīya) wede fīti tit’it’eralachihu፡፡ tigadelwachewalachihu፤ weyimi yiselimalu፡፡ bititazezumi ālahi melikami minidani yiset’achiḫwali፡፡ ke’āhuni befīti inide sheshachihu bitisheshumi āsamamīni k’it’ati yik’et’achiḫwali፡፡»

be‘iwiri layi (kezemecha bemek’itu) ḫat’ī’āti yelebetimi፡፡ be’ānikasami layi ḫat’ī’āti yelebetimi፡፡ bebeshitenyami layi ḫat’ī’āti yelebetimi፡፡ ālahinina melikitenyawinimi yemītazezi sewi keširochachewi wenizochi yemīfesubachewini genetochi yagebawali፡፡ yemīsheshewinimi sewi āsamamīwini k’it’ati yik’et’awali፡፡

kemi’iminanochu bezafītu širi k’ali kīdani bemīgabuhi gīzē ālahi be’irigit’i wedede፡፡ belibochachewimi wisit’i yalewini ‘āwek’e፡፡ be’inerisumi layi irigatani āwerede፡፡ k’iribi yeẖonenimi mekifeti menedachewi፡፡
bizuwochi zerefawochinimi yemīwesidwachewi yeẖonuni (menedachewi)፡፡ ālahimi āshenafī t’ibebenya newi፡፡

ālahi bizuwochini zerefawochi yemitiwesidwachewi yeẖonuni tesifa āderegelachihu፡፡ yihichinimi le’inanite āsichekolelachihu፡፡ ke’inanitemi yesewochini ijochi kelekelelachihu፡፡ (litameseginutina) lemi’iminanimi milikiti iniditiẖoni k’et’itenyawini menigedi yimerachihumi zenidi (yihinini šeralachihu)፡፡
lēlayitunimi be’iriswa layi gena yalichalachiḫwatini ālahi yawek’atini (le’inanite āzegajati)፡፡ ālahimi benegeru hulu layi chayi newi፡፡
inezīyami yekaduti (yemeka sewochi beḥudeyibīya) beteweguwechihu noro ( leshīshīti) jeribawochini bazoru neberi፡፡ kezīyami zemedimi redatimi āyagenyumi፡፡
ālahi yachini kezīhi befīti be’irigit’i yalefechiwini limadi denegege፡፡ le’ālahimi limadi lewit’ini ātagenyimi፡፡
